trans-unit.source: MOC parsing and manipulation in Python

MOCPy is a Python library allowing easy creation and manipulation of MOCs (Multi-Order Coverage maps). MOC is an IVOA standard enabling description of arbitrary sky regions. Based on the HEALPix sky tessellation, it maps regions on the sky into hierarchically grouped predefined cells. An experimental support for TMOC (temporal MOC) has been added since version 0.4.0. It allows creation, parsing and comparison of TMOCs.
trans-unit.target: MOCPy是一个Python库,可以轻松创建和操作MOC(多阶覆盖图)。MOC是一个IVOA标准,可以描述任意的天空区域。它基于HEALPix天空镶嵌法,将天空中的区域映射到分层分组的预定义单元中。从0.4.0版本开始,增加了对TMOC(时间MOC)的实验性支持。它允许创建、解析和比较TMOCs。

trans-unit.source: Please check the mocpy’s documentation by following this link: https://cds-astro.github.io/mocpy/
trans-unit.target: 请通过以下链接检查mocpy的文档：https ://cds-astro.github.io/mocpy/

trans-unit.source: Space & Time coverages (STMOC) are an extension of MOC to add time information. It is possible to get a TMOC by querying a STMOC with a MOC and/or get a MOC by querying a STMOC with a TMOC.
trans-unit.target: 时空覆盖（STMOC）是MOC的扩展，用于添加时间信息。可以通过用MOC查询STMOC来获得TMOC，和/或通过用TMOC查询STMOC来获得MOC。
